spans.text: Just as Taki was thinking about her schedule for the day, her desk suddenly emitted a dull warning.
「If you're free, shall we meet up tonight? Just come find me after work. Everyone's been worried about you since last time.
I might have to go to Hokkaido in a couple of days.
At this juncture... to go on a date. Taki Shiina rubs her face, her cheeks stiff, unsure if it's because she just woke up or for some other reason.
She admits her acting is quite clumsy, she has no ability to subtly confirm a crisis like a hysteria without arousing suspicion. Does she look like Anon Chihaya or Soyo Nagasaki?
Burning concern and gentle inquiries are what make Taki Shiina unable to resist, the best way not to be exposed is to shrink back into her own territory.
Even though Taki Shiina herself can't guarantee what's inside, the person herself only has one guess.
(I'll know eventually, what the result will be. In a few days.)
Taki Shiina puts her phone back on the desk, back where she originally placed it.
(She said there's no need to reply... but who decides to go on a date without saying a word.)
